desc: mSubimage extracts a subimage from one FITS file into a new FITS file.

arguments.name: mode
arguments.desc: Processing mode. The two main modes are 0 (SKY) and 1 (PIX), corresponding to cutouts are in sky coordinate or pixel space. The two other modes are 3 (HDU) and 4 (SHRINK), where the region parameters are ignored and you get back either a single HDU or an image that has had all the blank border pixels removed.

arguments.name: hdu
arguments.desc: Optional HDU offset for input file.

arguments.name: ra
arguments.desc: RA of cutout center (or start X pixel in PIX mode.

arguments.name: dec
arguments.desc: Dec of cutout center (or start X pixel in PIX mode.

arguments.name: xsize
arguments.desc: X size in degrees (SKY mode) or pixels (PIX mode).

arguments.name: ysize
arguments.desc: Y size in degrees (SKY mode) or pixels (PIX mode).

arguments.name: nowcs
arguments.desc: Indicates that the image has no WCS info (only makes sense in PIX mode).

return.name: content
return.desc: String giving an idea of output content (e.e., 'blank', 'flat', or 'normal'.
